title: Balanced Healing of Jacksonville: Holistic Physicians & Medicine
description: Balanced Healing of Jacksonville integrates traditional and alternative therapies to restore and promote optimal health, no matter where you are in your healing journey.
cleaned_text: Find out about our Integrative Wellness Practices Are you ready to feel the difference in holistic care? Holistic care is the art and science of healing that addresses the whole person - mind and body. Balanced Healing of Jacksonville integrates traditional and alternative therapies to restore and promote optimal health, no matter where you are in your healing journey. When you're a client of Balanced Healing you'll - You'll have a blend of integrative, functional and eastern medicine modalities to give you the most comprehensive care - Have an individualized protocol created specifically for you, based off your individualistic needs, which will change as you change - Receive at-cost blood work and functional labs - Receive 5% off all supplements purchased through our Fullscript online pharmacy - Never have extensive payment plans: I firmly believe that you shouldn't be locked into a health plan. As your needs change, your protocol will change too and payment plans do not leave room for flexibility At Balanced Healing of Jacksonville I am dedicated to providing you with the best care. You're not just a number. You will be treated like family, with respect and empathy. I will always do what is best for YOU. I'm here to support you through your health journey. BALANCED HEALING OF JACKSONVILLE IS THE PREMIERE MOLD AND MYCOTOXIN CLINIC IN NORTH EAST FLORIDA. Services [Adult & Pediatric New Client Consultations ](/natural-health-consultation/) Alternative and Integrative Solutions for Optimal Health in Jacksonville, FL [TELEHEALTH CONSULTATION](/long-distance-consultation/) Consultations that can be done online through our secure portal for those who are not local or prefer virtual appointments [COMPREHENSIVE LAB TESTING & ANALYSIS](/comprehensive-labs/) Lab work can be a huge piece to your wellness puzzle, let's "Test not Guess" to find answers. [CUPPING](/cupping/) Reduce inflammation, improve range of motion and alleviate tightness with this ancient healing modality [TRADITIONAL CHINESE HERBOLOGY](/herbs/) Bringing ancient wisdom to the modern world using classic formulas to address and support root imbalances [DETOXIFICATION](/detoxification/) Eliminate accumulated toxins and support your body's innate detoxification mechanisms [Infrared Sauna](/services/infrared-sauna/) Help your body detoxify, reduce stress, improve circulation, boost immune system, alleviate pain, improve mood, and increase energy.
